thread.title: Stanford G Marcus Allen out with foot injury
thread.title_full: Stanford G Marcus Allen out with foot injury

author: Pensioner faces 350 lashes in Saudi Arabia for making wine
title: Stanford G Marcus Allen out with foot injury
text:
Stanford G Marcus Allen out with foot injury FOXSports 3 hrs ago Â© Spruce Derden-USA TODAY Sports Mar 27, 2014; Memphis, TN, USA; Stanford Cardinal head coach Johnny Dawkins reacts during the first half of the semifinals against the Dayton Flyers during the south regional of the 2014 NCAA Mens Basketball Championship tournament at FedExForum. Mandatory Credit: Spruce Derden-USA TODAY Sports Stanford junior guard Marcus Allen will be out indefinitely with a stress fracture in his right foot, according to a report on Monday night from Tom FitzGerald of the San Francisco Chronicle .
AdChoices Marcus Allen started 22 of 36 games for the Cardinal during the 2013-14 season, averaging 6.4 points and 3.5 rebounds per games. During Stanford's foreign trip in Italy this summer, Allen scored in double figures three times, ending the trip with 17 points, nine rebounds, four assists and five steals in a win over Verona.
With the loss of Allen, sophomore point guard Robert Cartwright is the only guard on the roster to average more than 10 minutes per game last season.
Stanford opens the 2015-16 season on Nov. 13 against Green Bay.
